caption:
Warmer days? ☀️ Now’s the time — our Peruvian ceviche lineup is here 🇵🇪 and ready to refresh your palate! 🐟 Fish? Yes. Shrimp? 🦐 Of course. Mixto and Carretillero? Say less🔥 And if you’re hungry for more… our Trio Marino is the combination you didn’t know you needed. 
It’s not just ceviche… it’s a vibe!
